kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Nitin,
Thanks for participating in the Kentico Community Portal Q\&A discussions!
Here's some things to consider when creating discussions on the Kentico Community Portal.
* Use a helpful discussion title that is easily searchable and describes your question. Your original title "**NEED HELP"** does not describe your question or make your question topic easy to search for. * Upload images to an external host (like [https://beeimg.com/upload)](https://beeimg.com/upload) instead of embedding them as base64 encoded data into the page. Embedding images into the page makes them very slow to load. * Optimize your image before uploading it to help visitors with limited bandwidth and improve the SEO of your question for more visibility through organic search. You can use a free tool like [Squoosh](https://squoosh.app/) to optimize your image before uploading it. * Format your code using the markdown editor so it's easier for others to read your question. You can [read more about the editor we are using](https://community.kentico.com/blog/kentico-community-portal-update-milkdown-for-markdown-in-q-a).
I've updated the title of this discussion and formatted your question. Please be considerate of others in the future.
